## ResourceRule.actions property

The actions to which the rule applies.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
actions: string[];
```

## Remarks

Actions can contain wildcards. Wildcards honour the `:` delimiter (e.g. `a:*:d` would match `a:x:d` but not `a:x`<!-- -->).
